events.text:
This is the second sign... It's not really that different, it's kind of just significantly longer because it's meant to help debug/test our the actual length of messages that can display. Hopefully, it's actually long enough to be able to do that because otherwise I'm out of a job.
...
Is it finished yet? What do you think? Are you bored from reading this? Because I'm sure bored from writing it, but that's just how it goes.

events.question: Here, let's at least try out something more interesting! A question, this time. So, here's two options. [color=#C3EF5D]Choose correctly if you want to get a prize.[/color]

events.text: Oh, well I hate you too! [color=#EA6A59]Go away![/color]

events.choice: I love signs, they're so cool.

events.text: [shake rate=15 level=10]Yeah!!! Now THAT is what I'm talking about![/shake] [shake rate=20 level=20]WOOOO!!! THAT'S WHAT I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR![/shake]
